Perfect, thank you. I've sent through the assign request

Hi Yads,

Thank you for bringing this up. Here is my Customer ID: 12696217.

Thank you so much!
Do you have a customer ID? Or do I have to create a new customer profile?

Hi Yadira,

Thanks so much for checking in.

If you’re able to delegate me both Admin and Technical contact access in Crazy Domains, that would be perfect.
  • Admin access will make sure renewals and account settings are all looked after, so you don’t have to worry about missed notices or billing.
  • Technical access will let me set up and manage the DNS, hosting, and email smoothly for you.

Don’t worry, the domain will always remain in your name. This just gives me the access I need to manage things on your behalf. Since I’ll be using my own Crazy Domains login, I’ll show up as a new customer in their system, which is completely normal.

Once you’ve delegated the access, I’ll handle everything from there to make it as easy as possible for you.

Do I assign you access to admin and tech? And im assuming you're a new customer?

I've attached a screenshot of what Im seeing

Hi Yads,

Thank you so much for the update, we’ll wait for the Cloudflare export details.

It would also be wonderful if we could please have:
  • Delegate access in Crazy Domains, so we can update the nameservers and point the domain correctly
  • Any details we might need to make the transition as smooth as possible

Here’s a quick guide from Crazy Domains on how to set up delegation:
How to delegate my products and domains to another account

This will help us take care of everything for you and ensure there are no disruptions.

We really appreciate your help and support with this.

Hi Yads,

Thank you so much for the call earlier, it was lovely to connect with you.

To help us move things forward smoothly, we’d be so grateful if Steve could:
  • Provide us with delegate access to the Cloudflare account for yadscauchi.com
  • Share any login or invite details so we can manage the DNS records directly

This will make sure everything is set up correctly and running seamlessly for you.

Please let me know once access has been arranged — or if there’s anything else you need from me in the meantime. Always happy to help
I've just tried to call. You can call me at any time
